thread.title: Miff Page - Action Learning Initiatives
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Miff Page - Action Learning Initiatives

author: Miff Page - Action Learning Initiatives
title: Miff Page - Action Learning Initiatives
text:
We had a tight time frame and Flashbay was able to deliver ahead of schedule and we are very happy with the end result. From the initial enquiry right through to delivery James was great to deal with and made the process very smooth.
We highly recommend Flashbay based on our experience
